author: vgritsenko
msg: Removed test-configuration.props and PropertyManager - no such file and no such class found.
Added plain formatter to junit to see errors/exceptions

author: vgritsenko
msg: * Bootstrap meta collection with all system collections.
This is done in order to avoid StackOverflowException during startup:
to create meta collection, you have to update system collection, to
update system collection you have to update meta data, to update meta data
you have to create meta collection, go to beginning.
* When dropping collection, use super.dropCollection instead of coll.drop()
to avoid FilerClosedException due to stale collection in memory.
